CheckTitle: Ensure self-registration is enabled on the user pools and it is associated with an identity pool
Description: Self registration allows users to sign up for an account in the user pool. This is useful for applications that require users to sign up before they can use the application. Self registration can be enabled in the user pool settings.
Risk: If self registration is not enabled, users will not be able to sign up for an account in the user pool. This will prevent users from using the application.

Recommendation.Text: Self registration can be enabled in the user pool settings. To enable self registration, follow the steps in the documentation
